version_description:
- Adjust loading indicator animation speed;
- Display images in Apple Watch
- On Apple Watch, set minimal fetch interval to 30 seconds
- Play video with mp4 format instead of hls format
- Promote "signin on iPhone" reminder on Apple Watch when necessary
- Adopt dark UI theme
- Adjust twitter composer background color
- Mark retweet clearly
- Download relevant font if system language is Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, or Traditional Chinese
- Limit image cache to 128 Megabytes
- Fix Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, or Traditional Chinese font broken in previous two versions
- Fix Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, or Traditional Chinese font broken in previous two versions
- Fix occasionally replies don't show up after tapping tweet's text
- Adjust delay when update a tweet with 0 retweets or 0 likes

- Lower the contrast of action bar;
- Show volume indicator when video becomes visible and not muted
- Minor UI tweak
- Adopt iOS 13
- Add haptic feedback
- Improve energy efficiency
- Simplify video interaction logic
- Roll back due to the last release bundle is in compliance with iOS14.2
